item.title: Right is not the same as intuitive in product development
item.description: Some introductory note: I’ve written this post before reading Lean Startup by Eric Ries. Recently I finally found time to do it and … I wish this book existed five years ago :) The problems I describe below are not unique. If what you read resonates with you in any way, go and read the book - it explains these ideas in a lot greater detail, touching on some more complicated subjects like product life cycle and company structure.
